mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${tableName}(num, memberNum, name, title, content, groupNum, orderNo, depth, parent) VALUES(#{num},#{memberNum},#{name},#{title},#{content}, #{groupNum},#{orderNo},#{depth},#{parent})
mapper.update: UPDATE ${tableName} SET orderNo=orderNo+1 WHERE groupNum = #{groupNum} AND orderNo > #{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(count(*),0) FROM ${tableName} cb JOIN member m ON m.memberNum = cb.memberNum
mapper.update: UPDATE ${tableName} set hitCount = hitCount+1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT num, cb.memberNum, cb.name, title, content, groupNum, depth, orderNo, parent, hitCount, cb.created FROM ${tableName} cb JOIN member m ON m.memberNum = cb.memberNum where num = #{num}

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, title FROM ${tableName} cb JOIN member m ON cb.memberNum=m.memberNum
AND (num > #{num})
AND (( groupNum = #{groupNum} AND orderNo < #{orderNo}) OR (groupNum > #{groupNum} ))
ORDER BY num ASC
ORDER BY groupNum ASC, orderNo DESC
) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, title FROM ${tableName} cb JOIN member m ON cb.memberNum=m.memberNum
AND (num < #{num})
AND (( groupNum = #{groupNum} AND orderNo > #{orderNo}) OR (groupNum < #{groupNum} ))
ORDER BY num DESC
ORDER BY groupNum DESC, orderNo ASC
) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.update: UPDATE ${tableName} SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) boardLikeCount FROM ${tableName}_Like WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${tableName}_File(fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES(#{fileNum}, #{num}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
